notesStmt.note: Usage stains, slight water damage. Some quires have been strengthened. Slight mould-mottling
Fol. 153r: short prayer written by a different hand.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msItem.title: קצור זכר צדיק Ḳitsur zekher tsadiḳ

collation.p: Quires mostly of 10 leaves. Catchword on every verso; no signatures.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Sefardi cursive script of the 18th century.
